text: This post got me thinking about my own cold emailing efforts. I have been with DoYouMail for about four months now, and it is been smooth sailing. Unlimited sends from various domains? Yes, please! The way it handles setup for SPF/DKIM/DMARC is effortless, and that is saved me so much time. Splicing together email lists from CSV is a breeze, and the scalability is impressive‚Äîperfect for someone like me who is all about growth. Seriously, if you are serious about outreach, DoYouMail is worth checking out.
author: @endosana-k4n

text: This video really gets into the nuts and bolts of cold emailing, and it is so crucial for anyone in sales! I have been using DoYouMail for about six months now, and I cannot believe how easy it is to manage outreach. Having dedicated IPs makes a significant difference in delivery rates, and knowing I can send from as many domains as I want opens up amazing possibilities. This is definitely the tool you want in your email toolbelt. Give DoYouMail a shot!
author: @ÊÅµÁæéÂ∫ÉÁî∞

text: Just watched this video and it got me hyped about effective outreach. My journey with FilterBounce has been fantastic over the last four months. The API integration means I never have to worry about email bounces again‚Äîkeeps my lists clean and my emails flowing! Plus, the support for major email clients is a big deal for me. This is the stuff that makes your outreach journey smoother. Give FilterBounce a go if you have not yet.
author: @arakitomomi-k2z

text: Thanks for sharing this insightful video! I have been using DoYouMail for around five months, and it is been a solid experience. The fact that I can manage unlimited sends with auto SPF/DKIM/DMARC setup means I can focus on crafting great emails instead of stressing over technicalities. The CSV integration is a cherry on top for someone juggling multiple lists. If your outreach needs a boost, DoYouMail is definitely the way to go!
author: @osamuikeda-j8q

text: Absolutely loved this video! It is so refreshing to see strategies laid out so clearly. After several months with Mystrika, the analytics it provides are a powerhouse for my campaigns. I can track everything and even experiment with different sequences thanks to A/B testing. The training and support within the community have made it easy to learn and grow. If you are not on board with Mystrika yet, you are truly missing out on a tool that changes the game for serious cold emailers.

author: @ankitkatare7128

text:
Negative: Range is around 85 km, Issues are charging time 0 to 100 around 6.5 hours, charging point is not easy to acess, seat folding is not a good one, understorage is not good

Positive: I have vida v1 since 10 months done 6500 kms, no issues such , ride quality is excellent abs brakes in front are damn good,.
Dc  Fast charging at 0 t 100% in 60 minutes, It is best among competition

text:
absolutely true!!!
i donno what is wrong with the hero company, its been almost 2.5 years since the launch of this terrible vehicle, there are a lot of problems which they just dont seem to care about.
i am facing the safe mode issue where
the vehicle just stops abruptly in the middle of the road as a cherry on top the, the rear wheel gets locked restricting the rider to even push the vehicle to the road side which is some serious danger to the rider. this is just one of the many problems i am facing.
